verses.text: \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*: \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w*, \w Puah|strong="H6312"\w*, \w Jashub|strong="H3437"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shimron|strong="H8110"\w*—four \w in|strong="H1121"\w* all.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w addition|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* genealogy, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* 36,000 \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* wives \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.
